text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: A task is something that must be accomplished without fail.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: If one receives a task, they must see it through to the end, finishing it themselves.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That is what it means to be responsible.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Kyaa!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: A scream…? Wait, that was from the Ritto Dormitory…!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: W-Wait, Rice-san. Remember, if something dangerous is happening we are supposed to stay inside and call the Dorm Master…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Everyone, it is dangerous out here!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Th-That's Bourbon-san's voice…!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Rice-san!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hagaaa… Hawawa… Ababababa…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What the hell happened to you!? You're lookin' real pale!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: J… Ju… Just now… A hand… A zombie's hand…!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Tsk… I must tell the others to not come out right now. What we are dealing with is…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Ah. Bourbon-san, I'm from the decoration committee. How's the progress going with the zombie hand toy that I requested?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: My apologies! The head of the dormitory and the academy have both approved the purchase. All that is left is for me to complete the purchase, so… Hmm…? Huh…???

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Eh!? It was justa toy!! And yer phone ended up breakin' too!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That is correct. An error in the ordering process resulted in 50 “extremely fast zombie hands” being delivered to the dormitories. While returning them a malfunction occurred, and now we are in this predicament.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: 50!? Jeez! First the smoke machine and now this, yer real bad with machines, ain't ya…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: However, this is my task to complete. Therefore I must fix it myself…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: No, don't worry bout it. Creek n' I'll take care of it… Bourbon, you wait here.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Eh…?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haa… She really should try askin' for help with things like this. Anyways, Creek, see any zombie toys over there?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Hey, Tama-chan… Is this really okay? Not having Bourbon help us…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Well if Bourbon were to help us, she'd just end up breakin' the machines again, doncha think? What's the point of makin' her do somethin' she can't do?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It'd be like makin' a child who hasn't learned math yet keep track of their family's finances. No one'd do somethin' so cruel. Sometimes you just need the right people for the job, doncha think?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: (…But the expression Bourbon-chan had when you told her to stay…)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haa… Haa… Bourboon!! We found all the zombie toys!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I apologize… It was my task to fulfill, yet I had to rely on my Senpais to…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: No need to worry bout somethin' like this. You can always rely on us…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I refuse. There will be no need for your assistance in the future because I will not fail again.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I truly apologize for what transpired… I will conduct the rest of my tasks alone.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Eh? W-Wait up, Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yer not supposed to say “sorry” in times like these, all we wanted was a “thanks…” Aaahhh!! Waait uup!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Tama-chan…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Bourbon isn't the only one who needs a bit of help…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Rice-san…! I-Is everything okay? That scream… and Bourbon-san…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahh… U-Umm… Things are probably going to be okay.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Probably…?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for running out there so suddenly… I must've startled you right before you went to bed…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm… really sorry… Good night…
(Click…)
